comment: Mr. Stinchcomb is a very caring person, but can overstep boundaries. There is very little class structure and the syllabus and guidelines for assignments are always changing. That being said, he's still a good professor and his classes aren't hard.

Mr Stinchcomb is a very funny and personable prof but he will get stressed out and yell at the end of the semester and probably make massive changes to the syllabus at the very end. Seriously. I like him as a person but his teaching style needs some work. Probably great at freshman seminar but not so good at graduate level

Good professor, very caring. At the beginning of the semester, each students are put into pairs and each week one pair presents a chapter and then there is a group discussion about the topics presented.

He really and honestly cares about his students and their mental health. Every class, he makes sure to go around and check in on how each of us are doing. He also cares more about learning than assignments. He is also amazing about being real about the field and connecting our learning to practice. I definitely recommend him.
Stinchcomb is the best freshman seminar teacher by far, take him you will not regret it.

Professor Stinchcomb is hands down my favorite teacher I've ever had. He's hilarious, very caring about his students, and the work he requires is not demanding at all as he only cares about your engagement in class, which is easy since he keeps class interesting. His KSU1101 class never came close to being stressful for me, take him for sure!

Professor Stinchcomb is THE BEST KSU SEMINAR TEACHER. Take him if you can! He is understanding of his students and genuinely cares. I always looked forward to going to his class! He teaches in many different ways to keep it interesting. Do your work and you will walk out with an A.

I took him for my KSU seminar class and made class fun to go to, and lots of group activities so it was great for us to meet new people and make friends. Quizzes online, a couple essays, midterm and a final. Easy, fun, entertaining class would take again.

Stinchcomb is my favorite professor, a super easy A and really easy to get along with. His classes are always hilarious and he treats his students really well. If you have a chance to take have him as a professor youre very lucky!
Prof. Stinchcomb leads the pack on teaching. Challenging and makes you apply it to the real world. Much respect
One of the best new Professors in the department. Must take!!!
